11.content:
After the threesome of, Ben, Gwen and Kevin, decided to go and find Grandpa Max and defeat the alien invasion. They had just defeated a squadron of aliens and found out that some people have alien powers. Unfortunately, the boy they met, who had Heatblast's powers, couldn't join their group, so they just drove away, waiting for another clue towards Grandpa Max's location.

On the way back to their homes, the group was trying to get to know each other. "So Kevin, what have you been doing these past 5 years?" Ben asked.
"Oh, not much, I've made a living for myself by selling parts to aliens through the black market. But, I promise I won't anymore," Kevin replied.
"Good, so, did your plans always work, or were they foiled sometimes?" Gwen asked.
"Well, I have a very good, or should I say bad record on the subject, but I did have this one mistake. It was really embarrassing, I couldn't show my face around my clients for a month," Kevin replied.
"Ooh what," Ben inquired.
"Well, as long as you promise not to laugh. One time I was selling some invincible shields, and a little girl came up to me. I tried to shoo her away, but she poked me in the back and I collapsed. I was the laughing stock of the black market, forever.
" HAHAHA!" Ben yelled, laughing at this fact.

"Hey, Ben you said you wouldn't laugh and you have a big secret, too" Gwen said, "Maybe I should tell Kevin, 'your weakness'."
"NO!" Ben yelled," I'm sorry Kevin, Gwen please don't tell."

1122221.content:

"Then, you'll be the first to die from laughter," Kevin replied.
Kevin reached over to Ben's feet and slowly started to pull off his socks, off his, ankles, slowly moving over his heels, past his arches and finally sliding them off his toes. Even though he tried to hold on to them with his toes, he failed and the socks popped off his feet, leaving his, soft, pale and smooth soles and his cute bubble-like toes.
"Wow, Ben your feet are really soft, you must take really good care of them," Kevin said.

"Well, not rea-EEEEEEEE NOOOOOOO HOHOHOHOHO PLEASE STOHAHAHAHAP HAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAHAH AAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAH AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA DON'T TICKLE MY BARE FEEEEET HIHIHIHIIHIIH AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAHAH HAHAAHAHAHA!"

AHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHA! NOOOoo ho hoo oh ho...!"
Ben screamed, beside himself with hysterical laughter, just before he fainted because of his delirious laughter. "Well, its been 14 minutes, he held out longer than I thought. I guess I'll let him out now," Kevin said.

After letting him out he waited until Ben and Gwen woke up. Once they had, he apologized and hoped he would they would forgive him. "I'm really, really sorry," Kevin said.
"I guess it's okay," Gwen said, "I mean we did, beat you up like all the time."
"Well, I don't think it's okay! You almost killed me!" Ben shouted.
"Oh, come on Ben I think your over reacting," Gwen argued.
"Fine, but you better never do that again, EVER!" Ben shouted again.
"I'll try," Kevin and Gwen said simultaneously.

info.brief_description: A story of the characters of Ben 10 Alien Force were they get tickled.
info.description:
This FanFiction is about the characters of Ben 10 Alien Force, created by Duncan Rouleau, Joe Casey, Joe Kelly and Steven T. Seagle. This story will mainly be about tickling with the main plot involving some one getting tickled.

- No killing
- No sex

Please add on, but follow the restrictions, too.
